From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)

Verb

[edit]

elogiar (first-person singular present elogio, first-person singular preterite elogií, past participle elogiat)

  1. (transitive) to praise, to eulogise
    Synonym: lloar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of elogiar (first conjugation)

gerund elogiant
past participle masculine feminine
singular elogiat elogiada
plural elogiats elogiades

imperfect elogiava elogiaves elogiava elogiàvem elogiàveu elogiaven

preterite elogií elogiares elogià elogiàrem elogiàreu elogiaren
conditional elogiaria elogiaries elogiaria elogiaríem elogiaríeu elogiarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres

negative (no) — no elogiïs no elogiï no elogiem no elogieu no elogiïn

Related terms

[edit]
  • elogi

Further reading

[edit]
  • “elogiar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “elogiar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “elogiar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “elogiar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From elogio +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /e.lo.ʒiˈa(ʁ)/ [e.lo.ʒɪˈa(h)], (faster pronunciation) /e.loˈʒja(ʁ)/ [e.loˈʒja(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /e.lo.ʒiˈa(ʁ)/ [e.lo.ʒɪˈa(h)], (faster pronunciation) /e.loˈʒja(ʁ)/ [e.loˈʒja(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /e.lo.ʒiˈa(ɾ)/ [e.lo.ʒɪˈa(ɾ)], (faster pronunciation) /e.loˈʒja(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /e.lo.ʒiˈa(ʁ)/ [e.lo.ʒɪˈa(χ)], (faster pronunciation) /e.loˈʒja(ʁ)/ [e.loˈʒja(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /e.lo.ʒiˈa(ɻ)/ [e.lo.ʒɪˈa(ɻ)], (faster pronunciation) /e.loˈʒja(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /i.luˈʒjaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /i.luˈʒjaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /i.luˈʒja.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: e‧lo‧gi‧ar

Verb

[edit]

elogiar (first-person singular present elogio, first-person singular preterite elogiei, past participle elogiado)

  1. (transitive) to commend, to praise, eulogise
    Temos de elogiar o arquiteto que concebeu este edifício.
    We have to commend the architect who designed this building.

Conjugation

[edit]

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Further reading

[edit]
  • “elogiar”, in Dicionário infopédia da Lingua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Porto: Porto Editora, 2003–2025
  • “elogiar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From elogio +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /eloˈxjaɾ/ [e.loˈxjaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: e‧lo‧giar

Verb

[edit]

elogiar (first-person singular present elogio, first-person singular preterite elogié, past participle elogiado)

  1. (transitive) to praise, commend, compliment, eulogise

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of elogiar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive elogiar
gerund elogiando
past participle masculine feminine
singular elogiado elogiada
plural elogiados elogiadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present elogio elogiastú
elogiásvos 		elogia elogiamos elogiáis elogian
imperfect elogiaba elogiabas elogiaba elogiábamos elogiabais elogiaban

future elogiaré elogiarás elogiará elogiaremos elogiaréis elogiarán
conditional elogiaría elogiarías elogiaría elogiaríamos elogiaríais elogiarían

vos 		él/ella/ello

imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative elogiatú
elogiávos 		elogie elogiemos elogiad elogien
negative no elogies no elogie no elogiemos no elogiéis no elogien

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
